features: Smart APP and IR remote control；The 130 feet led strip lights support both app DAYBETTER and 24 keys ir remote for control, Different modes can be chosen, like Flashing, Quick, Jump, Fade, etc. You can freely choose to control 16 million colors
Music sync: Led lights strip color changing sync to music by smart phone with App, make your party up to the high peak, light up your life and makes life more colorful and wonderful
Smart Timing Settings;With timer function,The led strip has color memory and setting the time function,so it can automatically turn on and off
Room Decor:The bedroom decor aesthetic, is long enough for bedroom, ceiling, kitchen, living room, bar and party decoration
Easy installation:With strong adhesive, Just use adhesive to attach the strip light to a clean, dry surface, then follow instructions on manual and you can finish in minutes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very bright very pretty super easy
reviews.reviewText: I love these! They were super cheap, and they came with two rolls, I only used one, and this one covered my whole entire room and I haven't even opened the other one yet. I was annoyed because the remote wasn't working at all and it was really annoying to use but I downloaded the DayBetter app and it connected super easy and now I can control the lights with my phone and there's hundreds of color options. Will buy again! These are just pictures of my them around my door but I think it gives you a pretty good idea. It wraps around my dresser my closet below my bed all the way around my room they are so long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: When I first tested them on reel didn't work. I was about to send them back. I sent a note to the company, then I did some reading about the plug and I found that I didn't have the "arrows" together But I don't see arrows on one of the plugs but I flipped it over and I worked. The colors of the lighs are beautiful. The app works great the remote not so, at least for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a pretty good product.
reviews.reviewText: surprisingly its adhesive stuck really good to my wall, and it hadn't been cleaned in a while (I forgot to clean it before applying) so that's definitely a good quality. in my opinion, they could be a bit brighter but its not bad at all. decent brightness at its max. I was worried the remote control wouldn't work well from a few feet away, but it actually has range. As long as you point the front of the remote towards the plugin, or its base it will work from at least 5-6 feet away, maybe even more. my room isnt exactly that big, but its honestly the perfect length. so from my experience, the remote, adhesive, and brightness are all amazing. the brightness is the only thing you could say is off, but most people would probably not even notice. for its price, i would say these are some great LEDs. i recommend if you get a bad batch of them, make sure to return them and get another pair. overall great LEDs and easy to do. also if your not that good with directions, or actually even if you are i would just recommend reading the manual. im not that good with putting on LEDs since ive only done it maybe once or twice. maybe thats just me but its pretty useful. also if they dont work at first try switching the sides of the white parts, (the ones with the small stick-like shapes on them, idk what theyre called..) and they will work.sorry for a bunch of add-ons to this, but i had a lot to say. overall amazing LEDs, do recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks good, app is lame and requires account
reviews.reviewText: The good:The lights are wonderful, my house has high ceilings with a small loft ledge wrapping the entire living room, about 130ft total I was able to divide the lights 65ft one direction and 65ft the other. They're more dramatic at night but even in the daylight they bring a little life and fun to an otherwise dull and awkward area. Easy install and I like how they blend in with the walls when not in use.The bad:I could not get the app to work on Android, it was kind of bare bones and annoying to need an account for it. It didn't like my gmail and kept saying "Incorrect Email Format" or something but thankfully the remote is enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Led for teenages room
reviews.reviewText: I didn't dislike anything. My granddaughter had some before and they stopped working. You would have thought the entire universe was about explode and kill everyone. 😂😂😂 but I ordered some more. The next day when she came home school she was putting her lights up and was able to all her entire room. Needless to say she can go on with her life now☺️☺️☺️.

reviews.reviewerName: Seems to be legit and works good so far! The ending letter on the FCC ID is B usually its A or 1 so I dont know why its a B. Probably a slightly updated version of the A, I highly recomend spendi g the 8 dollars for the warrenty as within a year of heavy use you will get stick drift and need a new controller. The new Ps5 controllers were designed to need replaced after so many hours of use. I am not sure if that was for their profit or a design flaw. Other than that I highly recomend buying! If i have any complaints I will try and update you guys!Seems to be legit and works good so far! The ending letter on the FCC ID is B usually its A or 1 so I dont know why its a B. Probably a slightly updated version of the A, I highly recomend spendi g the 8 dollars for the warrenty as within a year of heavy use you will get stick drift and need a new controller. The new Ps5 controllers were designed to need replaced after so many hours of use. I am not sure if that was for their profit or a design flaw. Other than that I highly recomend buying! If i have any complaints I will try and update you guys!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lights up my room great!
reviews.reviewText: fairly easy to install. great deal for only 15 bucks. they are made fairly cheaply but for strip lights you dont need anything fancy. I was most worried about them not being bright enough but on the brightest setting with white as shown in photos it lights up the room nicely.cutting them is the only issue. You will cut out a foot or 2 of lights depending on where you cut. so experiment with extra length to where exactly you need to cut and you might end up a little short or long.Hope this makes sense. I highly recommend! cheap and exacly what I was hoping for!also when I installed I didnt put firm preassure on them and they are holding up nicely but you will have to clean the wall first otherwise they wont stick to the wall well enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lights, adhesion is questionable
reviews.reviewText: Great budget lighting setup, plenty of extra length to fit around my entire bedroom. Remote setup works great, only complaint is the adhesive backing doesn't stick too well. I didn't do anything to prepare the walls, but one section of the lights fell down after only a couple days. Otherwise, great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy installation, look nice, but remote doesn’t work
reviews.reviewText: These were super easy to put up, I thought it would be difficult but it wasn’t. They stuck to my walls and I did not clean them prior to putting them up. The remote worked before I put the lights up, when I tested it, but after installing the remote no longer works. Not a huge deal breaker, because my daughter prefers to use the app anyway. They look nice, lots of color options. We have only used them for 2 days, so I can’t speak on how long they last. Will get some more if they hold up.
Work great when first receiving them in May, bright, easy to put on but now for some reason one side doesn’t work otherwise work good!
Me ah gustado mucho las luces , buen pegamento se adhieren muy bien y la intensidad excelente de la Luz
Le encantaron a mi niña ya instaladas en su cuarto, fueron facil de instalar y tiene muy buena luminosidad.

I purchased this for my daughter for Christmas. One set works but the other set doesn’t work. I paid for shipping to receive this item and now I need to pay for shipping to return the item. I would have been nice if the seller paid for the return shipping and offered to send a new set that works. The seller also contacted me and asked that I not write a negative review as this could reflect negatively on them. I’m not impressed!
Remote control does not power on or off lights lights work and you can switch between colours but you cannot turn lights off you have to unplug them
